main_definition: A result, outcome, or item that is created through a process such as manufacturing, computation, or combination of various elements.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In business and economics, the term 'product' refers to an item produced by a company for sale to consumers. This includes physical goods like electronics, food products, clothing, etc., as well as services offered.
meanings_and_examples.example: The smartphone is one of our top-selling electronic products this year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In mathematics and computer science, 'product' denotes the result obtained by multiplying two or more numbers together. This term can also extend to operations involving arrays, matrices, or other complex structures.
In everyday language, 'product' might refer to the result or consequence of a process. This could be anything from the outcome of an effort (like exercise producing fitness) to natural phenomena.
meanings_and_examples.example: After months of rigorous training and practice, her performance at the piano has become a remarkable product of her dedication.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When used in agriculture or gardening, 'product' can refer to items that are grown on a farm or cultivated from plants. This includes fruits, vegetables, grains, and other harvestable outputs.
meanings_and_examples.example: The apple orchard produces an abundant variety of apples each season.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of media, 'product' can describe a piece of content or work created by a creator such as a film, book, music track, or television episode.
meanings_and_examples.example: The latest blockbuster movie is touted as one of our most anticipated product releases this summer.

meanings_and_examples.definition: 'Product' in the realm of chemistry and industry can refer to a chemical substance that has been synthesized, whether through natural extraction or laboratory production.
meanings_and_examples.example: The pharmaceutical company developed a new drug as their latest product.
